None.Name: Bedtime!
None.Description: Casts a fatiguing beam that makes the target unit fall asleep for 8 seconds after a short while. Sleeping units will awake after 3 seconds if being attacked. After Sleep wears off, target is immune against Sleep for 8 seconds.

None.Name: Nature's Wrath
None.Description: Enter this mode in order to enable the wrath of nature. Every 2 seconds, Dryad will then release the forces of nature to deal 35 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around the target, up to 55 in total.

None.Name: Gifted Genius Loci
None.Description: Friendly units in 20m radius around Dryad are immune against weakening abilities but may still be affected by spells like Freeze or Paralyze.
